text: Allahâ€Œi se'ijana yini tomadera srsti karechena, tarapara tomadera jibika diyechena, tarapara tini tomadera mrtyu ghatabena, tarapara tini tomadera jibanadana karabena. Tomadera ansidaradera madhye ki ke'u ache ye karate pare egulora madhyera kono kichu? Sakala mahima tamra'i, ara tara ye-saba ansi damra karaya se-saba theke tini bahu urdhbe.
